name: A Whole New World
description:
Explore and open your eyes.

This game is still in progress and not finished.

This is in the very early stages and yes has bugs.

Currently there is no end to this game.

Note: Pause menu is not complete and may not work.

Level 6 is currently the last level.(At the giant waterfall after the puzzle)

Leave a comment and tell us your thoughts!

and remember... it's different

Thanks,

Zoid_Co: Alpha
